Name: De Hu's
Review Text: Woow ... Asian tapas are delicious.  We had a surprise menu: the chef puts the best dishes on your table. Very good with friendly staff and a nice selection of wines.

Name: De Hu's
Review Text: Really enjoyed the atmosphere and a really varied and tasty tapas menu, my favourite was the spicy tuna balls (not really spicy)

Name: De Hu's
Review Text: Food and drinks awesome, only downside was the wait for the food and the strange order in which things came out, one dish missed completely.

Name: De Hu's
Review Text: The food is very good. Home made gyoza, juicy and fresh filling.  Spicy chicken wings were crunchy, yet succulent. Crunchy scallops were exactly that.  The interior is maybe a bit traditional and they could perhaps improve on that but the food makes up for it big time. Pleasant service as well.

Name: De Hu's
Review Text: Good service, nice atmosphere, tasty food. However, the dishes came out SO slowly, and they forgot to send two of the seven plates we ordered. Tapas is supposed to be all on the table together or quite close together, but this came tasting ‚Ä¶

Name: De Hu's
Review Text: The service is very slow, staff is incapable of managing the crowd! Clearly they are understaffed. The waitress said‚Äùif you are busy, you should not come here!‚Äù, for us, it is rude! Is it Dutch straightforwardness? ‚Ä¶

Name: De Hu's
Review Text: Asian tapas bar where one can delight in Asian fingerfood. I'll start by saying that I still  do think the prices are too high for the small dishes one gets... (Hence the 3 and not 4 stars) But we enjoyed ourselves while choosing the 3 or 4 ‚Ä¶

Name: De Hu's
Review Text: It was very good and the waitress was really nice, not really expensive for what it is !

Name: De Hu's
Review Text:
Restaurant looks good and it is comfortable.
Unfortunately the food that we ordered was not good. Bento box smaller then in photo and salmon was not fresh.  Service was also very slow (even when we were almost alone). Not really recommended!

Name: De Hu's
Review Text: We are living in Amsterdam and always looking for gastronomic Asian food. I stumbled upon De Hu's through The Fork, I was looking for places who give discounts. Da Hu's currently has a promotion because they just opened their business. I ‚Ä¶

Name: De Hu's
Review Text: Presentation and plating was an unexpected surprise. Food was only meh. Pricing was high, but given the location, not out of the ordinary. The rolls weren't that awesome. The eel roll was subpar. The scallop roll was interesting because the sushi rice was toasted so it had a surprising texture.

Name: De Hu's
Review Text: We loved the style of the restaurant, the service and the food. Great atmosphere, attentive staff. Highly recommended for a different take on Asian food.

Name: De Hu's
Review Text: Food is perfection. Service is friendly but not over bearing. I love the music. The waitress is gorgeous, btw.

Name: De Hu's
Review Text: OK food (not amazing, but not bad). Really slow service. Noisy.

Name: De Hu's
Review Text: Great food but the service was a bit slow gave it 5 stars for the food and cleanliness

Name: De Hu's
Review Text: Great food, service, decor snd atmosphere!
